title: Hitozuma no Kuchibiru wa Kan Chuuhai no Aji ga Shite: Kooriyama Yui Sonogo...

synonyms: Hitozuma no Kuchibiru wa Kan Chuuhai no Aji ga Shite OVA
Hitozuma no Kuchibiru wa Kan Chuuhai no Aji ga Shite Episode 9
alternative_titles.en: Chuhai Lips: In the Aftermath of Yui Koriyama
alternative_titles.ja: 人妻の唇は缶チューハイの味がして「郡山 結　その後…」

synopsis:
It's become a habit for Yui to have sex with Tsuyoshi, even though she knows she shouldn't. She finds herself kicking into gear every time she drinks strong chuhai. Yui has been restraining herself lately, but Tsuyoshi pushes her down, overcome by jealousy when she talks about her husband.

(Source: OceanVeil)
